sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update vendors which have company code with other fields that belongs to vendor table
Update all records based on Vendor to Purchase Organization and Company code to Purchase Organization
to check whether vendor record exists as a part of Step 11
Create vendor if not existing on staging table (for empty company codes)
To get company code of Purchase Organisation
Vendors created for those who have company code

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: started with company code so not to miss the vendors that don't have company code

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: to check whether vendor record exists as a part of Step 11
To get company code of Purchase Organisation
Update all records based on Vendor to Purchase Organization and Company code to Purchase Organization
Create vendor if not existing on staging table (for empty company codes)
Update vendors which have company code with other fields that belongs to vendor table
Vendors created for those who have company code
